item.title: Say "No" to Uncivilized Behavior】Don't Let Stray Dogs Become a Problem
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Recently, the reporter saw many stray dogs scurrying around the community in Qing Qi, which not only affects the cityscape, but also brings potential problems to the residents. I hope that dog owners do not abandon their pets, but also hope that the relevant departments to manage stray dogs. Please consciously comply with → The “Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Regulations for the Promotion of Civilized Behavior” Article 24 of the city in the built-up areas of keeping dogs, to comply with the following code of conduct: (d) do not abuse, abandoned dogs.

item.title: [90-second method] Feeding dog food? That's a legal liability, too.
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Stray dogs and cats can always be found in the streets, and most of them have experienced hardships and a rough fate. Fortunately, there are many kind-hearted people who will provide these homeless little ones with a full meal or even temporary shelter. **Wild shovelers, be aware that improper feeding can lead to legal risks! *** Related Cases On September 20, 2019, Zanzan, a man in his 60s in Zunyi, was knocked down by a dog on his way home and was diagnosed with multiple right-sided rib fractures, and was rated as having a Grade 10 disability after treatment.
